snippet: With the exhibition victory, the United States men’s soccer team ended a 24-match road winless streak against Mexico that spanned 75 years.
abstract: United States men's soccer team ends a 75-year drought, defeating 2012 Olympic champion Mexico, 1-0, in a friendly for its first victory on Mexican soil.
lead_paragraph: With the exhibition victory, the United States men’s soccer team ended a 24-match road winless streak against Mexico that spanned 75 years.

headline.seo: U.S. Men Win Soccer Game in Mexico for First Time
headline.main: U.S. Wins in Mexico for the First Time
headline.print_headline: U.S. Wins in Mexico for the First Time
